00025 // required file
00026 require LIB_DIR.'member_logon.inc.php';
00027 // check if member already logged in
00028 $is_member_login = utility::isMemberLogin();
00029 
00030 // if member is logged out
00031 if (isset($_GET['logout']) && $_GET['logout'] == '1') {
00032     // write log
00033     utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $_SESSION['email'], 'Login', $_SESSION['member_name'].' Log Out from address '.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
00034     // completely destroy session cookie
00035     simbio_security::destroySessionCookie(null, SENAYAN_MEMBER_SESSION_COOKIES_NAME, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR, false);
00036     header('Location: index.php?p=member');
00037     exit();
00038 }
00039 
00040 // if there is change password request
00041 if ($is_member_login && isset($_POST['changePass'])) {
00042     if ( procChangePassword($_POST['currPass'], $_POST['newPass'], $_POST['newPass2']) ) {
00043         $info = '';
00044     } else {
00045         $info = '';
00046     }
00047 }
00048 
00049 // if there is member login action
00050 if (isset($_POST['logMeIn']) && !$is_member_login) {
00051     $username = trim(strip_tags($_POST['memberID']));
00052     $password = trim(strip_tags($_POST['memberPassWord']));
00053     // check if username or password is empty
00054     if (!$username OR !$password) {
00055         echo '<div class="errorBox">'.__('Please fill your Username and Password to Login!').'</div>';
00056     } else {
00057         // regenerate session ID to prevent session hijacking
00058         session_regenerate_id(true);
00059         // create logon class instance
00060         $logon = new member_logon($username, $password);
00061         if ($logon->valid($dbs)) {
00062             // write log
00063             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $username, 'Login', 'Login success for member '.$username.' from address '.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
00064             header('Location: index.php?p=member');
00065             exit();
00066         } else {
00067             // write log
00068             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $username, 'Login', 'Login FAILED for member '.$username.' from address '.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
00069             // message
00070             $msg = '<div class="errorBox">'.__('Login FAILED! Wrong username or password!').'</div>';
00071             simbio_security::destroySessionCookie($msg, SENAYAN_MEMBER_SESSION_COOKIES_NAME, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR, false);
00072         }
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00076 // check if member already login
00077 if (!$is_member_login) {
00078 ?>
00079     <fieldset id="memberLogin">
00080     <legend><?php echo __('Library Member Login'); ?></legend>
00081     <div class="loginInfo"><?php echo __('Please insert your member ID and password given by library system administrator. If you are library\'s member and don\'t have a password yet, please contact library staff.'); ?></div>
00082     <form action="index.php?p=member" method="post">
00083     <div class="fieldLabel"><?php echo __('Member ID'); ?></div>
00084         <div><input type="text" name="memberID" /></div>
00085     <div class="fieldLabel marginTop"><?php echo __('Password'); ?></div>
00086         <div><input type="password" name="memberPassWord" /></div>
00087     <div class="marginTop"><input type="submit" name="logMeIn" value="<?php echo __('Login'); ?>" />
00088     </div>
00089     </form>
00090     </fieldset>

00093     /*
00094      * Function to show member change password form
00095      *
00096      * @return      string
00097      */
00098     function changePassword()
00099     {
00100         // show the member information
00101         $_form = '<form id="memberChangePassword" method="post" action="index.php?p=member">'."\n";
00102         $_form .= '<table class="memberDetail" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0">'."\n";
00103         $_form .= '<tr>'."\n";
00104         $_form .= '<td class="alterCell" width="20%"><strong>'.__('Current Password').'</strong></td>';
00105         $_form .= '<td class="alterCell2"><input type="password" name="currPass" /></td>';
00106         $_form .= '</tr>'."\n";
00107         $_form .= '<tr>'."\n";
00108         $_form .= '<td class="alterCell" width="20%"><strong>'.__('New Password').'</strong></td>';
00109         $_form .= '<td class="alterCell2"><input type="password" name="newPass" /></td>';
00110         $_form .= '</tr>'."\n";
00111         $_form .= '<tr>'."\n";
00112         $_form .= '<td class="alterCell" width="20%"><strong>'.__('Confirm Password').'</strong></td>';
00113         $_form .= '<td class="alterCell2"><input type="password" name="newPass2" /></td>';
00114         $_form .= '</tr>'."\n";
00115         $_form .= '<tr>'."\n";
00116         $_form .= '<td class="alterCell2" colspan="2"><input type="submit" name="changePass" value="'.__('Change Password').'" /></td>';
00117         $_form .= '</tr>'."\n";
00118         $_form .= '</table>'."\n";
00119         $_form .= '</form>'."\n";
00120 
00121         return $_form;
00122     }

00141     /*
00142      * Function to show membership detail of logged in member
00143      *
00144      * @return      string
00145      */
00146     function showMemberDetail()
00147     {
00148         // show the member information
00149         $_detail = '<table class="memberDetail" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0">'."\n";
00150         // member notes and pending information
00151         if ($_SESSION['m_membership_pending'] || $_SESSION['m_is_expired']) {
00152             $_detail .= '<tr>'."\n";
00153             $_detail .= '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>Notes</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" colspan="3">';
00154             if ($_SESSION['m_is_expired']) {
00155                 $_detail .= '<div style="color: #f00;">'.__('Your Membership Already EXPIRED! Please extend your membership.').'</div>';
00156             }
00157             if ($_SESSION['m_membership_pending']) {
00158                 $_detail .= '<div style="color: #f00;">'.__('Membership currently in pending state, no loan transaction can be made yet.').'</div>';
00159             }
00160             $_detail .= '</td>';
00161             $_detail .= '</tr>'."\n";
00162         }
00163         $_detail .= '<tr>'."\n";
00164         $_detail .= '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Member Name').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$_SESSION['m_name'].'</td>';
00165         $_detail .= '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Member ID').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$_SESSION['mid'].'</td>';
00166         $_detail .= '</tr>'."\n";
00167         $_detail .= '<tr>'."\n";
00168         $_detail .= '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Member Email').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$_SESSION['m_email'].'</td>';
00169         $_detail .= '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Member Type').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$_SESSION['m_member_type'].'</td>';
00170         $_detail .= '</tr>'."\n";
00171         $_detail .= '<tr>'."\n";
00172         $_detail .= '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Register Date').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$_SESSION['m_register_date'].'</td>';
00173         $_detail .= '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Expiry Date').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$_SESSION['m_expire_date'].'</td>';
00174         $_detail .= '</tr>'."\n";
00175         $_detail .= '<tr>'."\n";
00176         $_detail .= '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Institution').'</strong></td>'
00177             .'<td class="alterCell2" colspan="3">'.$_SESSION['m_institution'].'</td>';
00178         $_detail .= '</tr>'."\n";
00179         $_detail .= '</table>'."\n";
00180 
00181 
00182         return $_detail;
00183     }

00186     /* callback function to show overdue */
00187     function showOverdue($obj_db, $array_data)
00188     {
00189         $_curr_date = date('Y-m-d');
00190         if (simbio_date::compareDates($array_data[3], $_curr_date) == $_curr_date) {
00191             return '<strong style="color: #f00;">'.$array_data[3].' '.__('OVERDUED').'</strong>';
00192         } else {
00193             return $array_data[3];
00194         }
00195     }
00196 
00197 
00198     /*
00199      * Function to show list of logged in member loan
00200      *
00201      * @param       int         number of loan records to show
00202      * @return      string
00203      */
00204     function showLoanList($num_recs_show = 20)
00205     {
00206         global $dbs;
00207         require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00208         require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00209         require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging.inc.php';
00210         require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_UTILS/simbio_date.inc.php';
00211 
00212         // table spec
00213         $_table_spec = 'loan AS l
00214             LEFT JOIN member AS m ON l.member_id=m.member_id
00215             LEFT JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00216             LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id';
00217 
00218         // create datagrid
00219         $_loan_list = new simbio_datagrid();
00220         $_loan_list->setSQLColumn('l.item_code AS \''.__('Item Code').'\'',
00221             'b.title AS \''.__('Title').'\'',
00222             'l.loan_date AS \''.__('Loan Date').'\'',
00223             'l.due_date AS \''.__('Due Date').'\'');
00224         $_loan_list->setSQLorder('l.loan_date DESC');
00225         $_criteria = 'm.member_id=\''.$_SESSION['mid'].'\' AND l.is_lent=1 AND is_return=0 ';
00226         $_loan_list->setSQLCriteria($_criteria);
00227 
00228         // modify column value
00229         $_loan_list->modifyColumnContent(3, 'callback{showOverdue}');
00230         // set table and table header attributes
00231         $_loan_list->table_attr = 'align="center" class="memberLoanList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00232         $_loan_list->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00233         $_loan_list->using_AJAX = false;
00234         // return the result
00235         $_result = $_loan_list->createDataGrid($dbs, $_table_spec, $num_recs_show);
00236         $_result = '<div class="memberLoanListInfo">'.$_loan_list->num_rows.' '.__('item(s) currently on loan').'</div>'."\n".$_result;
00237         return $_result;
00238     }
00239 
00240     // show all
00241     echo '<h3 class="memberInfoHead">'.__('Member Detail').'</h3>'."\n";
00242     echo showMemberDetail();
00243     echo '<h3 class="memberInfoHead">'.__('Your Current Loan').'</h3>'."\n";
00244     echo showLoanList();
00245     echo '<h3 class="memberInfoHead">'.__('Change Password').'</h3>'."\n";
00246     echo changePassword();
00247 }
